question: How to make a pencil holder with toilet paper rolls.

question: How to Raise Threadfin Rainbowfish Fry
options: If you don't have breeding threadfins, you can easily purchase vials of eggs off Ebay. Place the eggs in an aquarium half full of clean, dechlorinated water heater to 87-89 degrees farenheit. Add a small sponge filter. Feed the fry zooplankton and tiny insects fromgreen water until they are big enough for artemia. Do 1000% water changes every other day.

question: use baby wipes for hemorrhoids
options: You can use baby wipes to make homemade hemorrhoid wipes that are so much cheaper than the ones you can buy in stores. Start with a package of wipes that contain aloe, then pour about 1/2 cup of witch hazel into the package. The combination of aloe and witch hazel is extremely soothing!

question: wash veggies
